root.title: “Sudzi” stele and inscription, The
root.history: The largest inscription of Kirghiz state epoch.
root.place: The stele was found in district Suuzhyin of Sayhan sum of Bulgan aimag of Mongolia.
root.store: The location is unknown. Some researchers consider that the stele got lost now.
root.investigation: Found by G.J.Ramstedt and he has made scientific translation of an inscription 252 in 1909. H.N.Orhun 253, S.E.Malov 254, U.A.Zuev 255, S.G.Klyashtornyi 256, G.Aidarov 257 and other scientists conducted researches of an inscription.
root.details: Н.Базылхан "Көне түрік бітіктастары мен ескерткіштері (Орхон, Ениесей, Талас)" //"Қазақстан тарихы түркі тілді деректемелерде" атты сериясы бойынша. II том. - Алматы: Дайк-пресс, 2005. - Б.162-163.
